title: Only got to play 4 games in my promos 2 - 2..
body:
First time posting and I hope this is the right place, I just got into my promo games - had two free wins, played two of them and was told I got demoted. Shouldn't I still have one game left? It's especially infuriating because I had an afk in the game I just lost...

I played so many games to get here, and now because of a few other players (not the only game for this to happen unfortunately) and what I assume is a bug. I'm just back at square one. It's not fair at all.

replies.body:
It looks like you might have dodged the lobby for your last game. 

Dodging is counted as an instantaneous loss if you're in a promotional series. You also loose any promo-helper games if you dodge in your promotional series. 

More information [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h6).
